title: ZBT #83: Sorry Mr. Jackson, (Oooooooh) We Are For Reaaaalllllll
description:
From Texas to NYC to Philly, the ZBT crew delivers the most correct takes on Afghani officers going AWOL,Â  #Puppetgate, and Dr. Ronny Jackson getting into a heap of trouble. Chaps interviews Josh Dawsey from the Washington Post about never having bought anything off Amazon, and the most recent news about Ronny Jackson. In a wild twist, everybody takes turns performing Celine Dion's 'Cause I'm Your Lady'


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/ZeroBlog30
